concept.title: oXygen Publishing Template
concept.shortdesc: oXygen Publishing Template defines all aspects related with the look and feel(layout and styles) of the WebHelp Responsive output.

conbody.draft-comment: Should explain the publishing template concept from the user perspective without many developer notes.
conbody.p: A oXygen Publishing Template was designed as a self-contained package stored either as a ZIP archive or as a folder on disk. This makes more easier to share a publishing template with others.
The and publishing template concept are tightly integrated with oXygen XML Editor/Author making the process to create, configure and publish more easier.
